1.title: Cancel subscriptions/payments plans
1.content: Please cancel my Disney+, Hulu, AdobeInDesign, T-mobile account

2.title: Deactivate socials
2.content: And don't forget to deactivate my social media accounts! Linkedin, Facebook, Instagram etc :(

1.request: Please donate all my books to the Northwestern University Library. I love the library and I hope that my books will be used by many students in the future. Thank you so much for your help!

2.request: Donate Clothes to St Vincent de Paul Charity. I have a lot of clothes that I don't wear anymore. I hope that they will be used by people who need them. Thank you so much for your help!

3.request: Donate laptop, phone, printer to Save the children foundation. I have a lot of electronics that I don't use anymore. I hope that they will be used by people who need them. Thank you so much for your help!
